attributes.action: Stop any plans of outsourcing work/letters/Medical results/typing from the NHS to India
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Primary Health care trusts are already/or in the process of outsourcing work from the NHS to India. This would include any Medical test results or paperwork relating to it being processed and typed up in India. This is totally unacceptable and because of the language barrier will cause major problems especially when it affects life and death situations. Please please support this and put a stop to it - before it costs someones life!!!!!!!!!!.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop any plans of outsourcing work/letters/Medical results/typing from the NHS to India."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12846.asp

Prime Minister's Office
